about_the_game:
Step into the world of Laundromat Manager Simulator—where your entrepreneurial skills and creative flair combine to transform a modest laundromat into a bustling business empire! Manage every detail, from upgrading state-of-the-art equipment to designing a standout interior, as you attract loyal customers and outshine the competition. Whether you’re a savvy strategist or a creative decorator, this is your chance to build the ultimate neighborhood laundry hub. Success is just a spin cycle away, are you ready to take it?

Upgrade Your Store

Attract more customers and maximize your profits by investing in essential upgrades. From expanding your space to optimizing operations, every choice matters.

Buy and Operate Machines

Choose from a wide range of washers and dryers, from basic models to premium, high-efficiency machines. Operate them efficiently to ensure customer satisfaction and smooth operations.

Stock Up on Laundry Supplies

Provide your customers with all the essentials they need, from detergent and fabric softener to laundry baskets. A well-stocked store keeps them coming back!

Furniture and Decorations

Transform your laundromat into a welcoming space with stylish furniture, cozy seating areas, and eye-catching decor. Every detail counts in creating an inviting environment that sets your business apart.

Customize Your Layout

Bring your creative vision to life by designing the perfect layout. Arrange machines, seating, and décor to balance functionality and aesthetics, ensuring customers enjoy every visit.

Design Your Interior

Go beyond the basics with unique themes, color schemes, and standout decorations. Make your laundromat not just a necessity but a local hotspot that customers love to visit.

With every decision you make, watch your laundromat evolve from a small startup into the ultimate laundry destination in town. Are you ready to take on the challenge and become the ultimate laundromat tycoon?

name: Laundromat Manager Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / RX 570 (4GB+ VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700K / AMD r5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060 / RX 6700 (8GB+ VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Manage your laundromat empire in Laundromat Manager Simulator! Upgrade your space, customize your layout, operate machines, and attract customers. Design a welcoming environment and grow your business into the ultimate laundry hub in town!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Turkish*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
